awd_titl_txt: Enhancement of General Physics Electrical and Electronics   Laboratory.
awd_abstract_narration: The Department of Physics at Morgan State University is                         modernizing its Electrical and Electronics Laboratory with                      instrumentation capable of being directly controlled by the                     students or by a personal computer or a combination of the two.                 This permits tutorial exercises and also allows students to                     observe physical phenomenon to reinforce and provide meaning to                 concepts presented in the classroom.  In cooperation with the                   Electrical Engineering Department, a laboratory is being                        developed in which a personal computer controls and rapidly                     gathers data from a variety of experiments.  Students are able                  also to use the personal computer to analyze and plot data and                  quickly experiment with various formulas to attempt to                          characterize their data.  Students may obtain high quality                      plots using printers attached to the PCs.
